content: this bowl shaped hot pad is designed to be used with your microwave safe bowls to provide a structure for you to hold when your food is hot lift the edges of the cozy up and out on two sides to safely transport your meal to the table of course you can use these on other bowls just set the bowl in the cozy and add your hot food these can also be used to keep ice cream cold in the summer time **important ** use cotton yarns only - other fibers may catch fire in your microwave be safe
